Name: Tidal Sprite
Story Background: Born in the foamy depths of the sea, the Tidal Sprite is a mischievous and agile creature that delights in causing turmoil among sailors.
Ability: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
Appearance Description: The Tidal Sprite is a lithe, blue-skinned merfolk with shimmering, iridescent wings that reflect the colors of the ocean. Dressed in ethereal, flowing garments, it exudes an aura of fluid grace.
